item.title: Sketches in Processing
item.description: Lately I have been curious about Fractals and Psychedelic patterns. This escalated when I found out about Daniel Shiffman’s Coding Train tutorials. Here are a collection of explorations and Processing Sketches I worked on.

item.title: Visualizing Radiology data
item.description: Predible Health is an AI startup. They work with Artificial Intelligence to draw out information from Radiology data. We collaborated on a project to create physical reports for the users â€“ Pulmonologist, radiologist, and patients. The objective of the project was to find an effective way of representing the Lung CT Scan data into a medical report, specially catered to our target users. The data we wanted to present was divided into three sections: Nodule analysis data, Low Attenuation analysis data, and High Attenuation analysis data.

item.title: 600 years of Ahom Kingdom
item.description: Type of Project Tags Academic Data Visualization Guide Tools used Prof. Vekatesh Rajamanickam d3js, mapbox, QGIS Link BTS 600 years of Ahom Kingdom Behind the Screens: 600 years of Ahom Kingdom Ahoms dynasty were the most celebrated in assamese history.
